description: A proper allerror page to display when error parsing msg.

optional.description: The timestamp when the error occurs.
The Requested IP Address if any.
The ID of the registered template theme.
The HTML that contains the header of the web page. This code can be modified by customizing the header.html common template.
The HTML that contains the footer of the page. This code can be modified by customizing the footer.html common template.

required.description: The locale of the current template page.
